name: Chrono Tech Enterprise
description:
Welcome to Chrono Tech Enterprise. We're thrilled to announce the launch of our latest creation: a time-travelling device. As the first test subject, you'll have the opportunity to travel through time and try new and exciting new equipment: like our state-of-the-art grappling hook. With our cutting-edge technology, you'll be able to explore the past and shape the future. So join us on this groundbreaking adventure and become a pioneer in time-travelling technology. And remember: the future is in your hands!

This is a short first-person puzzle/traversal game. Explore the laboratory under the guidance of the lab manager and find what lies at the end of the experiments.
